name: Demonic Revenge
description: The map contained in this wad is easily the best I have ever created. It's appealing to the eyes, while remaining very fun to play. The level is so well designed, and the story is so compelling, that it will leave you in awe for the rest of you're days. This wad contains advanced mapping tricks to keep you interested, and to help the flow of the storyline progress. No words can truly describe the masterpiece I have created here. It must be experienced. So, begin playing, and be prepared for the most eye-pleasing, jaw-dropping, and sensational masterpiece to ever hit the world as we know it. Replaces Map01 of Doom 2.
